emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Development Platforms
emerging_technologies.description: Platforms where AI not only suggests code but also autonomously designs, tests, and deploys software, significantly reducing human involvement in routine tasks.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces the barrier to software development, potentially increasing software diversity and innovation but also leading to job displacement concerns in coding.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Adoption will depend on trust in AI's reliability, regulatory frameworks for AI in software development, and the need for specialized AI training.

emerging_technologies.name: Fully Autonomous Vehicles
emerging_technologies.description: Vehicles that operate without human intervention, optimized for urban environments with integration into smart city infrastructure.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could reduce accidents caused by human error, but introduces privacy concerns, urban planning challenges, and job loss in driving professions.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory approval, public trust in autonomous systems, and infrastructure readiness are key.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Interfaces for Cognitive Enhancement
emerging_technologies.description: Non-invasive brain-computer interfaces that can enhance cognitive abilities, memory, or even control external devices.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Raises ethical questions about cognitive enhancement, potential for cognitive inequality, and privacy of mental data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Safety, ethical guidelines, and societal acceptance will determine adoption rates.

emerging_technologies.name: Space Resource Extraction
emerging_technologies.description: Mining operations on asteroids or moons to extract valuable resources like water, metals, or minerals.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for economic growth and sustainability but also involves legal and environmental considerations in space.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological feasibility, international space law, and economic viability are critical.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: Blockchain systems leveraging quantum computing for enhanced security and efficiency, making transactions virtually unhackable.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize digital security but also poses risks if quantum decryption becomes widespread.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Development of quantum-resistant algorithms, regulatory acceptance, and the need for quantum computing infrastructure.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Pair Programming
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems that work alongside developers to code, debug, and suggest optimizations in real-time.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech companies, with developers adapting to new collaborative coding practices.

mainstream_technologies.name: Urban Autonomous Transport Systems
mainstream_technologies.description: Integrated autonomous transportation networks in cities, reducing congestion and emissions.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in forward-thinking cities with supportive infrastructure.

epoch_themes.description: Technologies that augment human cognitive abilities, productivity, and creativity.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Potential to redefine education, work, and human-machine collaboration, raising questions about privacy and enhancement ethics.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Shift towards personalized education, increased productivity, and new forms of human-computer interaction.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on making urban environments sustainable through technology integration.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes sustainability but requires urban planning adjustments and could exacerbate urban-rural divides.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased urban populations seeking sustainable living, influencing city designs globally.
